header.title: About Us
header.subtitle: Connecting travelers with the soul of Mallorca

philosophy.title: More than a Tour, an Authentic Connection
philosophy.paragraph1: At Tasting Mallorca, we believe that traveling is much more than visiting places; it's about feeling, connecting, and living. We were born from a passion for our island, with the desire to show the Mallorca we love: the one with quiet villages, pristine landscapes, and enduring traditions.
philosophy.paragraph2: We move away from conventional routes to offer you immersive experiences in small groups. We want you to savor a slowly cooked dish, listen to the stories of our people, and take home an unforgettable memory, not just a photo.

pillars.title: Our Pillars
pillars.subtitle: These are the values that guide each of our experiences.
